DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of food effect on the bioavailability of a 25 mg empagliflozin tablet and assessment of dose proportionality between 10 mg and 25 mg empagliflozin tablets under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of the Effect of Food on the Bioavailability of a 25 mg Empagliflozin Tablet as Well as Assessment of Dose Proportionality Between 10 mg and 25 mg Empagliflozin Tablets Under Fasting Conditions.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
